title: Knock速 CRM Partners with MeetElise for Full Virtual Agent Integration
author: Nate Shames
summary: This article discusses the partnership between Knock速 CRM and MeetElise, which aims to enhance multifamily leasing operations by integrating AI technology.
main_content:
# Knock速 CRM Partners with MeetElise for Full Virtual Agent Integration

*Knock customers can optimize multifamily leasing operations with the AI power of MeetElise*  

Knock速 CRM, the leading performance management platform and CRM for multifamily property owners and managers, and MeetElise, the leading artificial intelligence-powered leasing agent software that now streamlines leasing processes for close to 1 million multifamily units nationwide, today announced their partnership and platform integration, providing seamless access to MeetElise's AI technology through Knock's platform.

### [Read more on PR Newswire >](https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/knock-crm-partners-with-meetelise-for-full-virtual-agent-integration-301519831.html)
